title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6174.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6174.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall govern the division's
determination whether an individual appears to meet the criteria for
certification as a victim of a severe form of trafficking in persons as defined
in section
7105
of title 22 of the United States Code or
appears to be otherwise eligible for any Federal, State or local benefits and
services and, if so, referral for services, as provided in Social Services Law, section 483-c c. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6174.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
